short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables HTML5 autoplay of videos and audios. This Version is ready for Manifest 3.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
he Disable HTML5 Autoplay extension stops HTML5 videos and audios from playing automatically on websites. Many sites automatically start playing videos, which can be both distracting and data-consuming. This extension ensures that videos and audios only play when you manually start them.

Features:

- Automatically disables autoplay for all HTML5 videos and audios on websites.
Mutes videos and audios to prevent unexpected sounds.
- Works right after installation with no extra configuration needed.

This extension is perfect for users who prefer a quieter and more data-friendly browsing experience.
